user.description: Enter your BMW CarData client ID.

authorize.title: Authorize BMW CarData
authorize.description: Open {verification_url} and enter the user code {user_code} if asked. Once you've approved the device, click Submit. If approval already completed, click Submit again to continue.

remove.title: Remove Integration
remove.description:
⚠️ **Delete entities and history?**

If you check this box, ALL sensors for this integration will be permanently deleted from Home Assistant, including their historical data.

Only check this if you want to completely remove all traces, or if you have orphaned entities with wrong names.

**Unchecked (default)**: Entities will be kept and can be reused if you re-add the integration later.

**Checked**: Entities will be permanently deleted. They will be recreated fresh if you re-add the integration.
